wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Coring (dates unknown) was an English organist.

response: Piper was paid as Organist in the 1560-1 accounts of the Chichester Cathedral treasury. He was also a Lay Vicar in the cathedral and was appointed Master of the Choristers in 1562.Organs and Organists of Chichester Cathedral His short tenure as Organist was to fill a one year interim role for Thomas Coring, who resumed his position in 1561.Early English Musick: High and Late Renaissance 1461-1536, Early Tudors
